text.autoconfig.elytrautilities.title: Elytra Utilities
text.autoconfig.elytrautilities.option.s: Set to true to enable holding down the Trigger Elytra keybind to automatically use a firework from inventory to takeoff from ground level
text.autoconfig.elytrautilities.option.t: Set to true to enable an icon that appears on the HUD when elytra flight is disabled
text.autoconfig.elytrautilities.option.e: Set to true to enable elytra flight as normal, false to disable elytra flight. This can also be managed in-game through the "Toggle Elytra" keybinding.
text.autoconfig.elytrautilities.option.j: Set to true to enable jump triggering the elytra while falling as normal, false to disable.
